timeline.message:
Kill mutations in FHIRExtractors

Updated the FHIRExtractors class and test coverage to be more thorough.
Updated the thrown exceptions to be more specific, rather than the generic WebApplicationException.
Renamed getMPI to getMBI, as it should have been all along.

Kill mutations in FHIRBuilders

Added some simple tests to the FHIRBuilders to kill all the things.

Remove potentially unused serializers

I don't think we need this anymore, so we can remove it.
FHIRRequestFeature is now mocked and unit tested.
Moved FHIRExtractors and removed unused imports.
Remove MethodOutcomeHandler.java because it's not actually needed.

timeline.bodyText: This comment is appreciated! I would have been very confused otherwise.
timeline.author: em1
